title: Chelsea striker Diego Costa lets slip Barcelona's Gerard Pique and Real Madrid's Sergio Ramos are best friends
text:
Sport Chelsea striker Diego Costa lets slip Barcelona's Gerard Pique and Real Madrid's Sergio Ramos are best friends You'd think the Barcelona and Real Madrid stars would hate each other, but they're like Romeo and Juliet Share I shouldn't have said that... (Photo: AFP) Share Get football   Thank you for subscribing!   
If there is one thing everyone knows about La Liga it's that Real Madrid and Barcelona are huge rivals. 
The two teams hate each other, what with Madrid seeing themselves as the 'nation's team' and Barcelona the outfit of the Catalan. 
And you'd expect the players on both sides to share this disdain for the opposition - and well, for the most part, they generally do. 
However, according to Chelsea striker Diego Costa, there are two rival players who are actually best friends, Gerard Pique and Sergio Ramos. Best buddies (Photo: AFP/Getty) Come and give me a cuddle, Pique (Photo: Helios de la Rubia) Oh Costa, that was a secret! (Photo: REUTERS) 
In an interview with Cadena Ser , Costa spoke about the Spain team and admitted: "Sergio Ramos and Gerard Pique love each other!" 
What makes this so interesting is that the respective players have represented their domestic clubs for years, so know all there is to know about the rivalry. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
